Package algonquin.cst2335.cst2335_finalproject.TriviaQuestions.data

Class HighScoresViewModel

java.lang.Object
androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel
androidx.lifecycle.AndroidViewModel
algonquin.cst2335.cst2335_finalproject.TriviaQuestions.data.HighScoresViewModel
public class HighScoresViewModel extends androidx.lifecycle.AndroidViewModel
The HighScoresViewModel class is an AndroidViewModel that acts as an interface between the HighScoresFragment and the data layer of the app, represented by the UserScoreDAO and AppDatabase.

  • Constructor Details

    • HighScoresViewModel

      public HighScoresViewModel(android.app.Application application)
      Creates a new instance of the HighScoresViewModel. It initializes the local database instance, the data access object, and the LiveData object.
      Parameters:
      application - The application context. AndroidViewModel holds a strong reference to the application.

  • Method Details

    • getHighScores

      public androidx.lifecycle.LiveData<List<UserScore>> getHighScores()
      Returns a LiveData object containing a list of UserScore objects. The returned LiveData object is observed by the HighScoresFragment to update the UI.
      Returns:
      a LiveData object containing a list of UserScore objects.

    • insertUserScore

      public void insertUserScore(UserScore userScore)
      Inserts a UserScore object into the local database. The operation is performed on a new thread.
      Parameters:
      userScore - The UserScore object to be inserted into the database.

    • deleteUserScore

      public void deleteUserScore(UserScore userScore)
      Deletes a UserScore object from the local database. The operation is performed on a new thread.
      Parameters:
      userScore - The UserScore object to be deleted from the database.
